words.description: The usually round, red or yellow, edible fruit of a small tree.
A set of written, printed, or blank pages fastened along one side.
A small domesticated carnivorous mammal with soft fur.
A hinged, sliding, or revolving barrier at the entrance to a building.
An oval or round object laid by a female bird.
The seed-bearing part of a plant, consisting of reproductive organs.
A berry, typically green or purple, growing in clusters on a vine.
A shaped covering for the head worn for warmth or as a fashion item.
A piece of land surrounded by water.
An outer garment extending either to the waist or the hips.
